resources.string: "Xiaomi Account %1$s's sign-in credentials have expired. Try again."

This photo is invalid. Try a different one.
"Verification code expired, start over or sign out Your account ID: %s"
Session expired, sign in again later
"Autofill sign-in isn't supported on watermarked versions"
Add your phone number to be able to sign in to your Xiaomi Account next time.
"%s has been connected to your Xiaomi Account. You can sign in to your Xiaomi Account using %s now."
This feature is not available for child accounts
Visit facebook.com/device and enter the code shown above.
Unexpected error while downloading an image.
To connect your account, open the Facebook app on your mobile device and check for notifications.
"You're in control - choose what info you want to share with apps."

"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."

"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
The phone number %1$s is associated with Xiaomi Account %2$s. It will no longer be associated with Xiaomi Account %3$s if you continue. Continue?
Enter your password to sign in
Mi Pay bank cards and NFC cards will be deleted after you sign out.
"After device is removed, it will be signed out of your Xiaomi Account automatically. You won't be able use this device to access the photos, messages, or other content stored in your account."
"If you didn't sign in on this device, change your password immediately."
"Can't sign in to Xiaomi Account on your device"
This email address is already associated with another Xiaomi Account.
The email address you entered is invalid.
This phone number is already associated with another Xiaomi Account.
This phone number is already associated with another Xiaomi Account
This account has already turned on this feature
An error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.

"This feature isn't supported on this device"
"Security risks detected. Can't use this feature."
A server error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.
The request timed out. Wait a minute or two and try again.

string.name: fido2_fingerprint_auth_desc
string.Data: Use your fingerprint to sign in to your Xiaomi Account and verify your identity Learn more

resources.string: Your device fingerprint has changed. Verify your account again to be able to turn on fingerprint verification.
Your password has changed. Verify your fingerprint again.
"You'll need to set an account password to be able to use fingerprint verification. You can do this in Settings > Xiaomi Account > Account security > Password."
"Can't get status due to account error"
A server error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.
"Can't turn off Find device. Enter your Xiaomi Account password again."
"You've changed your password within last %d days. Can't turn off Find device now due to security reasons."
Action was interrupted, wait a minute or two and try again
"Can't get device info, contact Xiaomi customer service"
A server error occurred, wait a minute or two and try again
An error occurred, try again later
A server error occurred, wait a minute or two and try again
"Can't get device status. Wait a minute or two and try again."
"You can associate up to %d Xiaomi Accounts with a phone number. Can't add new accounts."
"Can't send more verification codes to this number"
"We'll send an email with a verification code to the address you provide."
You must agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using Xiaomi Account and Xiaomi Cloud services.
This device is associated with an existing Xiaomi Account ID (%s).
Enjoy cloud services, family storage space, and more
Sign in to your Xiaomi Account
"Looks like you're using your First space Xiaomi Account."
"In such case, all the data will be synced to your Second space. To avoid this, don't turn on sync with the cloud."
"Don't turn on sync with the cloud"
Check the URL and try again, or copy the URL and open it in your browser.

"Xiaomi Account's background activity is restricted. Tap to allow."
"Xiaomi Account's internet access is restricted. Tap to allow."

Verifications services provided by China Mobile
Verifications services provided by eSurfing account
Verifications services provided by China Unicom

This nickname is invalid. Try a different one.
This photo is invalid. Try a different one.
Set the password for your account to sign in next time.
"To activate your account, follow the link we've sent to your inbox."
"<font color=Red>Looks like</font> the number %s has been recycled by your carrier, and there's a Xiaomi Account associated with it. Is this account yours?"
Session expired, sign in again later
The email you entered is already associated with another account.
The email address you entered is invalid
The text you entered is too long

The username you entered is invalid.
Visit account.mi.com to reset your password.
Xiaomi Account will be created automatically when you use a phone number for the first time.
Too many attempts. Wait a minute or two and try again.

Check when the number went online
Sign in with the previously used Google Account?
This number is associated with an existing account, enter your password
Sign in to your Xiaomi Account
"We'll create an account automatically if you're using your phone number for the first time."
A network error occurred. Check your network settings and try again.
Check the URL and try again, or copy the URL and open it in your browser.
"Couldn't connect to the network. Try again."
Password must be %1$d-%2$d characters in length and include both numbers and letters (case sensitive).
Your personal data will be stored in accordance with the laws and regulations of the region you select.
%1$d-%2$d characters of at least %3$d of the following types: letters, digits, special symbols
An outgoing SMS message may be required to activate this service. Your carrier will charge you for this message.
Too many accounts have been associated with this number, try a different one
You need to sign in again

"We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws and regulations. This app needs the following permissions to work normally:

Using camera (for setting your profile photo)

If you don't agree to grant such permissions, you won't be able to use some features of this app; however, its basic functionality will still be available to you. You can always restrict permissions or revoke your authorization in the Settings."

A system error occurred. Go back and try again.

Allow access to Gallery:
For setting profile photos

"If you continue, you'll withdraw your consent to Xiaomi Account Privacy Policy. We will cease to collect your personal information. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. As Xiaomi Account provides its services based on the collection of the necessary personal information, your withdrawal of consent will be held as refusing to accept Xiaomi Account services. Withdraw consent now?"
